client.communication

Class ServerProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.communication.ServerProxy

  • public class ServerProxy
extends java.lang.Object
    A proxy that acts like the server for the client. It contains all of the functions that can be called on the server. Each function calls the Client Communicator to complete the request.
    Author:
    Doug

      • ServerProxy

        public ServerProxy(java.lang.String host,
           int port)
        Parameters:
        host -
        port -
        Pre-Conditions
        the host is running the server on the specified port
        Post-Conditions
        initializes a ServerProxy to send commands to the Client Communicator

        Post-Conditions

        Parameters:

        password -
        Pre-Conditions

        Post-Conditions

      • joinGame

        public void joinGame(java.lang.String playerinfo,
            int id,
            CatanColor color)
        Parameters:
        playerinfo - username and password
        id - the game ID
        color - one of the acceptable colors
        Pre-Conditions
        user is logged in, a game with the id exists, the color is a valid color
        Post-Conditions
        the user is added to the game and the board is updated to show that

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Pre-Conditions
        user is currently part of a game
        Post-Conditions
        game command history is cleared and the players still remain. the http response contains the current client model

      • getCommands

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getCommands()
        Returns:
        list of all the commands that have been executed in the game
        Pre-Conditions
        user is part of a game
        Post-Conditions
        gets a http success or failure response if success contains all of the commands.

      • acceptTrade

        public void acceptTrade(boolean accept)
        Parameters:
        accept -
        Pre-Conditions
        A trade has been offered, if you accept is true the user has the required resources
        Post-Conditions
        the trade offer is removed. If accepted resources are exchanged if not nothing happens.

      • discardCards

        public void discardCards(ResourceList discardedCards)
        Parameters:
        discardedCards -
        Pre-Conditions
        status of the client model is discarding, user has over 7 cards, user has chosen cards to discard
        Post-Conditions
        user no longer has the discarded resources

      • rollNumber

        public void rollNumber()
        Pre-Conditions
        it is the users turn, the client model's status is rolling
        Post-Conditions
        client model status changes to discarding, robbing or playing

      • buildRoad

        public void buildRoad(boolean free,
             EdgeLocation roadLocation)
        Parameters:
        free - is the placement part of setup
        location - where the road will be placed
        Pre-Conditions
        the location is open, it is connected to a road owned by the player,, it is not on water, the player has the required resources, during setup must be placed by a settlement with no adjacent roads
        Post-Conditions
        the resources used are no longer in the players hand, the road is placed on the game board, and the game has checked for longest road

      • buildSettlement

        public void buildSettlement(boolean free,
                   VertexLocation place)
        Parameters:
        free -
        place -
        Pre-Conditions
        the location is open, it is not on water, it is connected to a road unless during setup, player has the required resources, it is not adjacent to another settlement.
        Post-Conditions
        player no longer has the used resources, the settlment is placed on the map.

      • buildCity

        public void buildCity(VertexLocation place)
        Parameters:
        place -
        Pre-Conditions
        the player has a city at the location and they have the required resources.
        Post-Conditions
        the resources are gone, the city is on the map and the player got a settlement back.

        Post-Conditions

        Pre-Conditions

        Post-Conditions

      • playSoldier

        public void playSoldier(HexLocation place,
               Player victim)
        Parameters:
        place -
        victim -
        Pre-Conditions
        the robber is moving, the player being robbed has cards.
        Post-Conditions
        the robber moved, the victim gave up a card, check for largest army, set dev card played to true for this turn.

        Parameters:

        two -
        Pre-Conditions
        the specified resources are in the bank
        Post-Conditions

      • RoadBuilding

        public void RoadBuilding(EdgeLocation one,
                EdgeLocation two)
        Parameters:
        one -
        two -
        Pre-Conditions
        road location one is connected to a current road, road location two is connected to a current road or location one, neither is water, the player has two unused roads
        Post-Conditions
        the player has two fewer roads, the new roads are placed on the map, longest road check.

        Parameters:

        Post-Conditions

        public void monument()
        Pre-Conditions

        Post-Conditions
